Package weka.core.stemmers

Interface Summary
Stemmer Interface for all stemming algorithms.
 

Class Summary
IteratedLovinsStemmer An iterated version of the Lovins stemmer.
LovinsStemmer A stemmer based on the Lovins stemmer, described here:

Julie Beth Lovins (1968).
NullStemmer A dummy stemmer that performs no stemming at all.
SnowballStemmer A wrapper class for the Snowball stemmers.
Stemming A helper class for using the stemmers.
